name: pxlr-cms
description: Full-stack CMS with Fastify backend, React admin panel, and Next.js frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run sync:watch" "npm run open:browser"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:admin && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.build: npm run sync && concurrently "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:admin" "npm run build:frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
